name: Gentle Stretch
description: Restorative stretching for low energy days. No effort required, just release.

coach.intro: This is gentle. Really gentle. You're not trying to achieve anything — just letting your body release. Breathe slowly and deeply throughout.
coach.motivation: Rest is productive. Your body rebuilds and repairs during recovery. This isn't lazy — it's smart.
coach.completion: You've given your body exactly what it needed. Sometimes the best training is no training.

structure.notes: Start here. Let everything go. Breathe into your back.
Very slow. Move like honey. No rushing.
Gentle version. Knees can bend. Just hang.
Right side. Use props. Don't force depth.
Left side. Breathe into any tightness.
Bend knees as much as you need. Just fold.
Supported version — can place block under sacrum
Lying on back. Hand on belly. Slow breath.
Final rest. Let your body be heavy. Let your mind be quiet.
